programme.title: Pompon Ours - EP 34
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard - EP 10
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: La Cabane A Histoires - EP 9
programme.desc: Four best friends have a secret: after school, they climb up to their hidden tree house. It contains a priceless treasure: books! Each day, the children tell one another stories, travelling to exciting fairy-tale worlds.

programme.title: Sam & Julia - EP 66
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Droners - EP 19
programme.desc: 95% of the planet Terraqua is covered by its oceans. Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse make up the Tikis, a team from the idyllic archipelago of Nui. They have the firm intention of winning the ''Whale Cup'', the biggest drone race ever.

programme.title: Api ! - EP 22
programme.desc: Laeti has a phobia of dogs. When she finds herself face to face with a dog and panics, Api comes to her aid.

programme.title: Le Refuge D'audrey - EP 14
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 12
programme.desc: Manolo, Lounis and Felix want to try the experience of drinking before a party, but Sigis gives them non-alcoholic beer. Vic gets involved in the end-of-year ball so that it will be memorable.

programme.title: Tamia - EP 10
programme.desc: Tamia is a courageous young girl who does nothing without careful thought. She wants to be a mediator between parents and their children, a voice for those without one. Helped by friends Audrey, Sara, Yao and Cheick, she enjoys plenty of adventures, taking her young audience on a veritable journey.

programme.title: Seul
programme.desc: November 2000. Yves Parlier is about to set off in the Vendee Globe. This non-stop, unassisted, single-handed round the world race is the perfect opportunity to match your childhood heroes. But it's more than a race. It's an incredible test of endurance and survival.

programme.desc: Discovering the treasures of the French regions, the initiatives and people who bring them to life.

programme.title: Basik

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur - EP 39
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.desc: Born into a Syrian-Kurd family, Ramman has been subjected to discrimination all his life and fled Alep during the bombing. In France, he is finishing his architecture degree and working on a sensitive project to reconstruct the plans of the prison of Palmyra, an emblematic site of Syrian repression.

Sure of having made the right choice, she thinks contacting the media will give her case added weight.

Investigation and debate.

programme.desc: Clemence Castel takes Thierry to discover Alencon. Retired, he is involved with Restos du Coeur. Disability is a cause that is important to him, so he shares his good humor and makes himself useful to others.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1661
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Cosy, Le Mag Deco - EP 19
programme.desc: In Alsace, Valerie has renovated a house belonging to a former monastery. An interior design enthusiast, she sought to respect the history of the house whilst ensuring it looked as good as new.

programme.title: Face Au Climat - EP 1
programme.desc: Lying to the north of the Canadian Arctic circle, Tuktoyaktuk is the last village before the Beaufort Sea. Here, coastal erosion, melting permafrost and rising sea levels have become an implacable reality. Anne Quemere meets locals and scientists in search of sustainable solutions.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 88
programme.desc: Cooking is a way of building bridges between countries and sharing cultural diversity. Starting with a typical ingredient from the French overseas departments and territories, the chef creates a unique dish.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Cosy, Le Mag Deco - EP 19
programme.desc: In Alsace, Valerie has renovated a house belonging to a former monastery. An interior design enthusiast, she sought to respect the history of the house whilst ensuring it looked as good as new.

programme.title: Ma Petite Escapade - EP 16
programme.desc: Clemence Castel takes Thierry to discover Alencon. Retired, he is involved with Restos du Coeur. Disability is a cause that is important to him, so he shares his good humor and makes himself useful to others.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 32
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Partie De Campagne - EP 28
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphael, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Comment Dessiner... - EP 2
programme.desc: In each episode, a tutorial for budding artists! Around the theme of Easter, children will have the keys in hand to succeed in their illustrations of a hen, a rabbit, or a decorated egg.

programme.title: Comment Dessiner... - EP 3
programme.desc: In each episode, a tutorial for budding artists! Around the theme of Easter, children will have the keys in hand to succeed in their illustrations of a hen, a rabbit, or a decorated egg.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 6
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 3
programme.desc: The king of the village of Kossrogbo is the wealthiest and most powerful of all in the surrounding area. His daughter has now grown-up and is looking for a husband. The king agrees to give his daughter's hand in marriage, but only to the most courageous man in the land.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 4
programme.desc: The snake that wasn't very bright dreamed of eating guinea fowl, a meat he had never tasted. Unfortunately his choice falls on his best friend, the much more cunning Kondje.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Femmes De Science - EP 9
programme.desc: Astrophysicist Francoise Combes is president of the Academy of Sciences, professor at the College de France, holder of the Galaxies and Cosmology Chair since 2014.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1662
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Olympe, Une Femme Dans La Revolution
programme.desc: Paris, 1793. Four years after the start of the Revolution. In this violent and changing society, women still have few rights. A woman of letters and a fighter, Olympe de Gouges opposed Robespierre head-on. Imprisoned alongside other convicts from all walks of life, she continued to fight.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 19
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Etat Limite
programme.desc: How can one provide proper care in a sick institution? Psychiatrist at Beaujon Hospital in Clichy, Jamal Abdel-Kader tirelessly navigates between wards and patients. Despite performance requirements and a lack of resources, he strives to ease their suffering.

The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. programme.desc: The 2025 ICC Women's Cricket World Cup will be the 13th edition of Women's Cricket World Cup. programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 8
programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: PL GOATS - EP 3
programme.desc: No Australian has made more Premier League appearances than Mark Schwarzer, so who better to decide on the true Australian GOAT from those who have made the journey from Down Under to the Premier League.

programme.title: PL 100 - MARK SCHWARZER
programme.desc: Premier League 100, celebrates some of the leading names to have achieved iconic milestones within England's top flight. From scoring over 100 goals, to making over 100 clean sheets, we speak to the legends that left their mark and reflect on the goals and saves that set them apart from their rivals

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 15
programme.desc: Edwin van der Sar has faced down pressure on the biggest stages in world football, but his toughest battle came after retirement. In 2023, the legendary goalkeeper suffered a life-threatening brain haemorrhage. In this episode Edwin opens up on his recovery and looks back on his career at the top that redefined goalkeeping.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 42
programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.title: REVIEW - SUN 05 OCT
programme.desc: Review covers all the action from Matchweek 7, kicking off with Bournemouth versus Fulham, Arsenal host struggling West Ham in North London, followed by Chelsea taking on Champions, Liverpool, at the Bridge.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 19
programme.desc: We chart the remarkable journey of one of the Premier League's most iconic midfielders, Yaya Toure, from his humble beginnings in Bouake, Ivory Coast, to his rise through European football's elite clubs. We sit down with Toure to discuss his development at ASEC Mimosas, his path playing with the likes of Monaco and Barcelona, and his eventual arrival at Manchester City, where he became a driving force behind the club's transformation into a football powerhouse.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 9
programme.desc: Since joining Liverpool in 2023, Cody Gakpo has become a key figure at Anfield - playing a major role in their Premier League title win last season. This week, The Big Interview sits down with the Netherlands international to learn about his rise, at the PSV academy from the age of six, to winning one of football's biggest prizes.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (LIV)
programme.desc: Relive another extraordinary Premier League campaign as Liverpool soared to an historic 20th league title, Nottingham Forest defied expectations and the promoted sides were strenuously challenged. There were also tactical transformations, shifts in narrative trends, and a more open field than ever before. Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: PL BEST OF... PREMIER LEAGUE FRENCH CONNECTION
programme.desc: A celebration of France's greatest football icons, featuring Thierry Henry, David Ginola, Robert Pires, Claude Makelele, Emmanuel Petit and many more.

programme.title: PL 100 - THIERRY HENRY
programme.desc: Premier League 100, celebrates some of the leading names to have achieved iconic milestones within England's top flight. From scoring over 100 goals, to making over 100 clean sheets, we speak to the legends that left their mark and reflect on the goals and saves that set them apart from their rivals

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 12
programme.desc: We follow the remarkable journey of Olivier Giroud, from his Premier League days with Arsenal and Chelsea to Champions League glory and beyond. A World Cup winner known for his elegance and resilience, Giroud's career has taken him from London to Milan, then to LA, and now back home with a move to Lille. As he begins this new chapter, we reflect on the highs, the hurdles, and the legacy of one of football's most underrated and enduring strikers.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 8
programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: REVIEW - SUN 05 OCT
programme.desc: Review covers all the action from Matchweek 7, kicking off with Bournemouth versus Fulham, Arsenal host struggling West Ham in North London, followed by Chelsea taking on Champions, Liverpool, at the Bridge.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2023/2024 (MNC)
programme.desc: The 2023/24 Premier League season will be forever remembered as one of the greatest campaigns ever. From an absorbing title race, Jurgen Klopp leaving Liverpool to Luton living the dream in the top-flight - Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: NETBUSTERS - EP 7
programme.desc: Fast-paced with music, ISO angles, and commentary, Netbusters offers an alternative review of every goal and key moment from the latest round of Premier League fixtures.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 47
programme.desc: We look back on the extraordinary career of Mohamed Salah, tracing his rise from a small village in Egypt to global football stardom. We speak to those closest to him to highlight his early years, struggles, and determination, shedding light on the pivotal moments that shaped his journey to becoming a Premier League legend with Liverpool.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 18
programme.desc: In 2024/25, AFC Bournemouth smashed their club record with 56 Premier League points, but less than 20 years earlier, they were drowning in debt and fighting for survival. This is the story of a club that defied the odds, silenced the doubters, and rose to become a certified Premier League contender, with their eyes set on Europe.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 8
programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: PL MASTERCLASS - EP 5
programme.desc: Some of the Premier League's biggest stars take us onto the pitch to discuss the techniques and thought processes that allow them to perform at the highest level. Featuring Morgan Rogers, Joelinton, Martin Odegaard and Ryan Gravenberch.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2018/2019 (GB: SALAH, MANE, AUBAMEYANG)
programme.desc: We take a look back at some of the most spectacular and important goals from previous Premier League seasons.

programme.title: NETBUSTERS - ERLING HAALAND SPECIAL
programme.desc: Netbusters provides an alternative look at the weekends matches - all of the goals, key saves, misses and tackles in a fun, fast-paced 26 minutes.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: We celebrate the greatest goalscorers in Premier League history; the icons whose instinct, power, and flair have lit up stadiums and etched their names into footballing folklore. From Alan Shearer's relentless consistency to Thierry Henry's elegance, Sergio Aguero's killer instinct to Harry Kane's rise, we relive the moments that defined an era.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 17
programme.desc: Maya Yoshida quietly became one of the Premier League's most dependable defenders during his years at Southampton, but his influence reached far beyond the pitch. In this episode, we look back at Yoshida's journey from Japan to England's top-flight, his role as a leader for club and country, and the cultural bridge he helped build along the way.

programme.title: PL BEST OF... PREMIER LEAGUE FRENCH CONNECTION
programme.desc: A celebration of France's greatest football icons, featuring Thierry Henry, David Ginola, Robert Pires, Claude Makelele, Emmanuel Petit and many more.

programme.title: PL 100 - THIERRY HENRY
programme.desc: Premier League 100, celebrates some of the leading names to have achieved iconic milestones within England's top flight. From scoring over 100 goals, to making over 100 clean sheets, we speak to the legends that left their mark and reflect on the goals and saves that set them apart from their rivals

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 12
programme.desc: We follow the remarkable journey of Olivier Giroud, from his Premier League days with Arsenal and Chelsea to Champions League glory and beyond. A World Cup winner known for his elegance and resilience, Giroud's career has taken him from London to Milan, then to LA, and now back home with a move to Lille. As he begins this new chapter, we reflect on the highs, the hurdles, and the legacy of one of football's most underrated and enduring strikers.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 8
programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: REVIEW - SUN 05 OCT
programme.desc: Review covers all the action from Matchweek 7, kicking off with Bournemouth versus Fulham, Arsenal host struggling West Ham in North London, followed by Chelsea taking on Champions, Liverpool, at the Bridge.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 2
programme.desc: Former England and Premier League goalkeeper David James takes on 1-to-11, naming his ultimate lineup from the best players he shared the pitch with. Across spells at Liverpool, Aston Villa, West Ham, Manchester City, and Portsmouth, James played alongside some of the league's biggest names. It's a team built on world-class ability, big personalities, and plenty of memorable moments.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 17
programme.desc: Mario Melchiot recalls his Premier League journey, which began as part of an ambitious Chelsea team. The Dutch defender played in the Blues' high-stakes final day clash in 2003 with Liverpool, before moving to Birmingham City and then captaining Wigan Athletic.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 4
programme.desc: Marcelo Bielsa brought Premier League football back to Leeds in 2020, following a 16 year exile from the top flight. Amidst the backdrop of a global pandemic, Bielsa's full-throttle tactics made Leeds the story of the season. Stuart Dallas recalls the highlights.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 9
programme.desc: Since joining Liverpool in 2023, Cody Gakpo has become a key figure at Anfield - playing a major role in their Premier League title win last season. This week, The Big Interview sits down with the Netherlands international to learn about his rise, at the PSV academy from the age of six, to winning one of football's biggest prizes.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 11
programme.desc: When Arne Slot guided Liverpool to their 20th League title in his debut season, it marked the beginning of a new era, yet echoed a familiar tradition. Explore the rich legacy of Liverpool's managerial transitions, where through decades of change, one constant endures: the club's remarkable ability to evolve and triumph, through seamless succession.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 19
programme.desc: We chart the remarkable journey of one of the Premier League's most iconic midfielders, Yaya Toure, from his humble beginnings in Bouake, Ivory Coast, to his rise through European football's elite clubs. We sit down with Toure to discuss his development at ASEC Mimosas, his path playing with the likes of Monaco and Barcelona, and his eventual arrival at Manchester City, where he became a driving force behind the club's transformation into a football powerhouse.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 22
programme.desc: A former Premier League star sits down to select the best team they played with, guiding us through their picks from 1-to-11 and including insights and anecdotes from on and off the pitch.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 13
programme.desc: One of the most elegant players ever to grace the beautiful game, Dimitar Berbatov reached his peak in the red of Manchester United. The Bulgarian recalls his journey, from humble beginnings to becoming a Premier League champion and Golden Boot winner.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 1
programme.desc: One of the greatest players of his generation revisits some of the iconic Manchester United v Liverpool clashes that he was a part of. We hear the stories behind the images from the greatest rivalry in English football, with Scholes reminiscing about the many battles he fought in the middle of the park against Steven Gerrard.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2010/2011 season.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Darren Daniel vs. Dricus Du Plessis
programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts in South Africa including two Middleweights Darren "Double D" Daniel and Dricus "Stillknocks" Du Plessis who will meet in the hex for middleweight supremacy. Bonus coverage includes Alain Ilunga vs. Sydney Mokgolo and Themba Gorimbo vs. Alex Cheboub.

programme.title: WCCB Uisma Lima vs. Shervantaigh Koopman
programme.desc: The IBO Super Welterweight World Championship is on the line when champion Uisma Lima of Portugal defends against undefeated Shervantaigh Koopman at the Emperors Palace in Kempton Park, South Africa. Lima claimed the title with a unanimous decision victory over Sukhdeep Singh Bhatti in December, and will be looking to make his first successful defense against the IBO Intercontinental titleholder, Koopman.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 3: Tokyo, Japan - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kyokushin Karate and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet and Breaking featuring Masters Shihan Yuzo Goda and Shihan Isamu Fukuda.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBC welterweight title bout between Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Victor Ortiz, which generated $78 million in pay-per-view revenue from 1.25 million buys. Also on the card, action from super welterweight champ James Kirkland and Alfredo Angulo.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Harumafuji, Okinoumi, Myogiryu and Goeido from the Aki basho, 2015.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode, we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Paris as some of the 2016 Olympics' finest athletes battle for their shot at glory.

programme.title: WCCB Tim Tszyu vs. Sebastian Fundora
programme.desc: From the T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, undefeated Super Welterweight World Champion Tim Tszyu travels from Australia to defend his title against former World Champion Sebastian Fundora. Fundora stands 6'5", and is known for his all-action and exciting style. He replaces an injured Keith Thurman, and jumps into a World Title match-up against one of boxing's rising stars in Tszyu.

programme.title: WCCB Demetrius Andrade vs. Demond Nicholson
programme.desc: Undefeated former WBO Middleweight World Champion Demetrius Andrade moves up to Super Middleweight for the first time, taking on Demond Nicholson. Nicholson is coming off three straight victories including two by knockout, following a tough decision loss to knockout artist Edgar Berlanga. Andrade has accumulated a perfect 31-0 record, including five straight defenses of the Middleweight World Championship. Watch as he makes his entrance into the Super Middleweight division, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Derrell Coley vs. Kip Diggs / Fernando Vargas vs. Jose Morales
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another excitingGreatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. In a fight for the vacant NABF Welterweight Championship, evenly matched Derrell Coley (29-1-2) and Kip Diggs (27-2) square off in what would be a classic back-and-forth battle, with multiple knockdowns and a fight to close to call on the judges' scorecards.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Jean Pascal
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight championship contest featuring Bernard Hopkins and Jean Pascal meeting for a second time. Their original contest, just five months earlier, resulted in a controversial draw, and the WBC ordered a rematch. Also on the card, action from young heavyweight stud Deontay Wilder.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 1
programme.desc: The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 2
programme.desc: The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 3
programme.desc: When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: How many siblings does Norrie have? What's Duggee's favourite badge? What does everyone do on Fridays? Squirrel Club has the answers!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Water, water, everywhere - there's a flood in our hospital soap opera! Grown-up Tag the firefighter splashes around. It's a good job grown-up Happy the lifeguard is on hand

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, there's a story told in blocks, the tale of a first tooth, a fable about changing emotions, and a yarn involving the Squirrels as puppets.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 22
programme.desc: Bluey promises her customer, Bingo, the best tour ever in a game of Whale Watching, but they need Mum and Dad to join in, and they are too tired to play after a late night.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 23
programme.desc: When Dad's accused of fluffing in Bluey's face as he climbed out of bed, he's put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 24
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 96
programme.desc: Po collects lots of balloons and takes off into the air! Floating high above Teletubbyland, Po waves at Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa‐Laa below. When the balloons pop, Po lands.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and do some exercise.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 33
programme.desc: Hooper puts on a spectacular magic show. However, with so much to do and so little time, it's unclear if The Great Hooperini can put on a magical performance for everyone to remember.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 47
programme.desc: Pug starts asking Dog for the answers to life's big questions. They go on an adventure with Granny Pug who shows them that there are not always simple answers to difficult questions.

programme.desc: When Messy and friends discover how levers work, farmyard animal bath time commences with a splash!

programme.desc: Lofty's giant sneezes go a long way, so Messy and his friends must help to wash OKIDO clean of all the bad germs flying around!

programme.desc: When Stan is too scared to go into the cellar, Monty wonders if even adults get scared.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 16

But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 - EP 11

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S3 - EP 115

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S3 - EP 116

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 11

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: Big Chris is feeling ill so Marsha sends him to bed until he is better. Big Chris enjoys the attention rather too much and fails to let everyone know when he is on the mend.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 13

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, it’s movie night in the dollhouse! Demanding Director CatRat leads the Gabby Cats through a Gabby-fied version of a classic story, Gabby-locks and the Three Bears.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: During a camping trip Jim gives Lucky and the girls a treasure map that sends them on the adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: When Lucky and Pru find themselves on opposing teams for a school fundraiser their competitive streaks emerge and their friendship is tested

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 - EP 4

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 5

programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes masks and capes for her and Pandy, they become the dollhouse defenders and must save the Gabby Cats from Bad Guy CatRat! In the Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song about her garden magic!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: It’s Game Show Day in the dollhouse! Our wily and well-groomed host, CatRat, leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like Tushy Tunes on the "butt xylophone" couch and a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: The Agenda

programme.title: Africa Live

programme.desc: The 113th Drama Serial, inspired by the lives of Koizumi Setsu and Lafcadio Hearn also known as Koizumi Yakumo, portrays those who were left behind in the rapidly Westernizing Meiji era. At its heart is a woman captivated by ghost stories and her foreign-born husband. Together, they share a life that seems ordinary yet delightfully odd.

programme.title: ETV Special "Picture Brides: Echoes from Beyond the Frontier" (R)
programme.desc: A century ago, "picture brides" sailed to the U.S. to marry Japanese immigrant men seen only in a photo. The story of three generations' journeys in America with newly uncovered audio tapes. Featuring singer songwriter Hana Hope.

programme.title: Game Genome Special Edition: Tokyo Game Show 2025
programme.desc: TV games are enjoyed all around the world and has become a type of ‘culture’. This _x000D_entertainment program analyzes and discovers the amazingness of TV games with _x000D_singer and dancer Miura Daichi, welcoming some other game lovers as guests.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: Project X: The Challengers-New Beginnings "Japan's Game Console Revolution" (R)
programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: City-Scope (R)
programme.desc: This program solves little mysteries we encounter in the town every day, making use of time-warping and clairvoyant power of the special goggle 'city-scope'.

programme.title: Drama 10 "Shiba Inu's Rule" Eps. 2 (R)
programme.desc: An egoistic magazine editor in his forties finds himself completely alone at work-abandoned by colleagues, with only his Shiba Inu by his side. Inspired by the dog, he proposes a Shiba-themed magazine. Misfits are forced to collaborate, sparking friction and chaos. But through the dog’s gentle gaze, ideas emerge, and broken hearts begin to heal.

programme.title: Songs for Everyone
programme.desc: A song program where children can sing along by reading the lyrics on the screen.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news from Tokyo.

programme.title: Drama Serial Encore "Toto Nee-Chan: Fatherly Sister" Eps. 111
programme.desc: The 94th Drama Serial is about a girl Tsuneko who struggles to protect her mother and two sisters instead of her deceased father with following his lesson "How precious a normal life is." The lifestyle magazine published by Tsuneko becomes a must-read book for every woman living through the high economic growth period.

programme.title: Drama Serial "The Ghost Writer's Wife" Eps. 11 (R)
programme.desc: The 113th Drama Serial, inspired by the lives of Koizumi Setsu and Lafcadio Hearn also known as Koizumi Yakumo, portrays those who were left behind in the rapidly Westernizing Meiji era. At its heart is a woman captivated by ghost stories and her foreign-born husband. Together, they share a life that seems ordinary yet delightfully odd.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: Haiku Koshien 2025
programme.desc: We follow high school students through a summer devoted to the Haiku Koshien. As the day of competition approaches, they refine each verse with care, choosing every word alongside their teammates.

programme.title: EXPO 2025 Osaka: Closing Ceremony
programme.desc: Live coverage of the Expo 2025 Osaka, Kansai, Japan closing ceremony.

programme.title: My Gardening
programme.desc: Learn useful tips on gardening.

programme.title: Points at Issue
programme.desc: Specialists from different fields will make commentaries on current event issues.

programme.title: The Fountain of Ancient Wisdom (R)
programme.desc: The challenges we face today are similar to what our forerunners went through. The program searches for clues to solve problems, utilizing the wisdoms of historical figures.

programme.title: Exploring Factories (R)
programme.desc: An entertainment program visiting small and large factories to discover the latest science, hidden artisanship, and enthusiastic people that support traditions of Japanese manufacture.

programme.title: PythagoraSwitch
programme.desc: There are various interesting laws and rules and philosophies hidden in our daily lives. This program introduces children to them and how to think.

programme.title: Fun with Japanese
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a word as a theme, exploring its meaning and history while discovering the charm of Japanese language. The program also features dance performances of quotes from the world’s great figures, visits schools to interact with children, and introduces classical performing arts and songs, making it enjoyable for both children and adults.

programme.title: Peek-a-boo
programme.desc: Bringing out potential and capability of children aged 0 to 2 years by stimulating their feelings with pictures and sound.

programme.title: With Mother
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: 1-Minute Anime: Songs for SDGs
programme.desc: Let's learn about SDGs while singing along! A selected goal out of 17 will be introduced in each one-minute song with animation.

programme.title: World Music Album
programme.desc: A 5-minute music program introducing classical music.

programme.title: Kid's Discovery
programme.desc: In this program, children around the age of 4 can experience the pleasure of playing with friends, the wonder of life, the joy of doing thigs by themselves, and consideration for others, all while having fun through various discoveries.

programme.title: Nyan-chu! Space! Broadcasting! (R)
programme.desc: Nyan-chu, a cat from the earth, introduces human lives and cultures to the aliens in outer space.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: NHK News 7 (B)
programme.desc: NHK's core news program wrapping up the day's events in an easy to understand way.

programme.title: 100-Camera Stories "Haneda Airport"
programme.desc: A countless number of cameras is set at a spot. The cameras observe people’s unconscious yet natural behaviors which could capture certain decisive moments.

programme.title: World Song Travel "The Philippines"
programme.desc: Japanese songs around the world! Why are they so beloved by people everywhere? This program travels to different countries in search of the answer. This time, the journey takes us to the Philippines. What kind of encounters await?

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: News Watch 9 (B)
programme.desc: NHK's mainstay evening news program.

programme.title: The Comedy of LIFE
programme.desc: Comedy skits depicting joys and sorrows of life will be presented in omnibus formats.

programme.title: Night Serial Drama "Someday, in the Weightless Sky" Eps. 21
programme.desc: Four high school girls once dreamed of exploring space together as members of the astronomy club. Now grown up and walking their own paths, they unexpectedly reconnect with the dreams they had long forgotten. "If it's a microsatellite… maybe we can still aim for space, even now!" Encouraged by their younger selves, they embark on a second youth -- chasing the stars once more.

programme.title: Late Night Show with Nitty and Gritty (New)
programme.desc: Enjoy an unprecedented interview program hosted by two mole puppets. Guests who can't show their faces in public will also appear as puppets and answer plainly to delicate questions one after another.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Yokai
programme.desc: Kijimuna of Okinawa - a red-haired child spirit in banyan trees - brings fortune to fishermen but punishes betrayal, embodying nature in local life.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture - this episode looks at words related to Japanese sweets. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Yoshida Ryusei, an October matsuri, features rockets called ryusei that are made by local teams and carry community prayers high in the sky - team members pour heart and soul into their efforts.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Wagashi: Nature in Sweets
programme.desc: Our explorer visits a historic store in Kyoto to delve into the world of wagashi and experiences making these delicate sweets that are a depiction of nature and the seasons.

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Admired since ancient times for their beauty, Japanese swords are amazing works of art - this time, Yasutsuna (Onikirimaru), a blade that was used to defeat a terrible demon.

programme.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: We look at how Sendai has transformed into a disaster-resilient city with its 'multiple defences', countermeasures taken in its coastal area to minimise damage from a tsunami.

programme.title: Designing Thread
programme.desc: Yamagata / Nakui Naoko (Book Designer): Thread for traditional 'shina' fabric takes a year to make - ultrafine mohair is also made here with a 60-year-old device. Nakui admires the hunt to improve.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: Letters on Hiroshima
programme.desc: Eighty years ago, Truman, scientists and citizens voiced their remorse and struggle in letters upon facing the tremendous force of the atomic bomb - what messages do these voices carry for us today?

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: Grand Sumo Legends
programme.desc: Bulgarian-born Kotooshu was the first European to become an Ozeki - he even beat two powerful Yokozuna to win a tournament in 2008. We dive into his career through archival footage and interviews.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: Biz Stream

programme.title: Fit with the Doctor's Cyborg
programme.desc: Come learn 'Pro Tips' and 'Improvement Points' on sprinting that include correct posture, line of sight, swinging your arms and elbows, moving your feet and how to sprint without injury.

programme.title: Design Ah Neo

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan

programme.desc: At Li Rui's sewing school, students remake adult clothes into clothes for kids, things they no longer wear but can't bear to part with. Kind to home and the environment, it's a place full of laughter.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Seoul, the capital of South Korea, has a population of 9.6 million - home to one fifth of the country's residents, Seoul is famous for the celebration of tradition as well as the latest in fashion.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: David Bull came to Japan to master the art of woodblock printing - he learned valuable lessons about Japanese culture and that there is more to the works of art than the paper they are printed on.

programme.title: Impacts: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: To help reduce the 'ghost' marine debris that does not decompose, those involved in Japanese fisheries have launched a project to collect and recycle used fishing nets.

programme.title: Designing Thread
programme.desc: Yamagata / Nakui Naoko (Book Designer): Thread for traditional 'shina' fabric takes a year to make - ultrafine mohair is also made here with a 60-year-old device. Nakui admires the hunt to improve.

programme.title: Where We Call Home

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: Kaizoku
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea - we explore their history and legacy with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: the Kurushima Straits.

programme.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: We look at how Sendai has transformed into a disaster-resilient city with its 'multiple defences', countermeasures taken in its coastal area to minimise damage from a tsunami.

programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] As the city of Chang'an faces a major crisis during the eve of Lantern Festival, death row prisoner Zhang Xiaojing (Lei Jia Yin) is given a critical mission to save the city of Chang'an together with Li Bi (Jackson Yee) within twelve hours.

programme.title: The Longest Day in Chang'an - EP 34
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] As the city of Chang'an faces a major crisis during the eve of Lantern Festival, death row prisoner Zhang Xiaojing (Lei Jia Yin) is given a critical mission to save the city of Chang'an together with Li Bi (Jackson Yee) within twelve hours.

programme.title: As Beautiful As You - EP 39
programme.desc: Ji Xing (Tan Song Yun), refuses to endure the stifling corporate grind, she quits her job to embark on a challenging entrepreneurial journey and eventually secures the investment of Han Ting (Xu Kai). Together, they advance in the medical and health industry.

programme.title: As Beautiful As You - EP 40
programme.desc: Ji Xing (Tan Song Yun), refuses to endure the stifling corporate grind, she quits her job to embark on a challenging entrepreneurial journey and eventually secures the investment of Han Ting (Xu Kai). Together, they advance in the medical and health industry.

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 2
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang'an.

programme.title: Broken Trust - EP 12
programme.desc: Qian Dahai built his fortune from scratch and is the man behind the Qian Group. Despite all the wealth and prestige, his relationship with family is a failure. It wasn't until his son Yiming gave him a lesson that he reevaluated his shortcomings.

programme.title: Golden City - EP 730
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2057
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 3
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang'an.

programme.title: D.I.D. 12 - EP 10
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Eccentric detective Xing Kai (Owen Cheung) and superintendent Ding Luofeng (Bowie Lam) come from strikingly similar backgrounds but have taken very different paths in life. A serial murder case brings them together.

programme.title: Coroner's Diary - EP 30
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Qin Wan (Landy Li), the daughter of the minister of Dali Temple, relied on her superb medical and forensic skills to join hands with Prince Yan Chi (Ao Rui Peng) to solve unsolved cases and find the real culprit in order to vindicate her father.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2058
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: A Fallen Xian - EP 6
programme.desc: The swindler Chen Mukun (Danny Hung) used the name of god Lu Dongbin (Brian Tse) to defraud. Alarmed, God Lu descends to the mortal world to punish him. Due to a strange combination of circumstances, God Lu loses his powers and is forced to stay here.

programme.title: A Fallen Xian - EP 7
programme.desc: The swindler Chen Mukun (Danny Hung) used the name of god Lu Dongbin (Brian Tse) to defraud. Alarmed, God Lu descends to the mortal world to punish him. Due to a strange combination of circumstances, God Lu loses his powers and is forced to stay here.

programme.title: Eternity - EP 16
programme.desc: Stunt man Fung (Alex Fong) and Inspector Yeung were good friends and they were wooing the same girl, Wai (Jessica Hester Hsuan). Wai chosed Fung and they went on a holiday in Xi’an. There, Fung met a girl named Hung (Faye Wong), whom he had faint memory of her saving him twenty years ago. Yet he was astonished as Hung looked the same without aging a bit. Since then, his mind was preoccupied with Hung.

programme.title: My Sister of Eternal Flower - EP 9
programme.desc: FA LAI-CHU (Charmaine Sheh) is a kindhearted and innocent woman with the IQ of a ten-year-old. When her parents passed away, she shouldered the responsibility for the care of her younger sister and brother.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes IV - EP 17
programme.desc: Senior Chemist of Forensic Science Division Ko On (Raymond Wong), Senior Forensic Pathologist Man Ka-hei (Selena Lee) and Kowloon West Regional Crime Unit Senior Inspector Kwok Fai-wong (Shaun Tam) are the pillars of Crime Busting Trio leading a team of outstanding individuals. They unravel appalling schemes by using advanced forensic science. Their mastery of pathology enables them to decode secrets of the human anatomy.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes IV - EP 18
programme.desc: Senior Chemist of Forensic Science Division Ko On (Raymond Wong), Senior Forensic Pathologist Man Ka-hei (Selena Lee) and Kowloon West Regional Crime Unit Senior Inspector Kwok Fai-wong (Shaun Tam) are the pillars of Crime Busting Trio leading a team of outstanding individuals. They unravel appalling schemes by using advanced forensic science. Their mastery of pathology enables them to decode secrets of the human anatomy.

programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 7
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 8
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years.
